# Rotation Mode Values

**API Collection**

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAKeyframeAnimation/rotationMode] property.

## Constants

- **rotateAuto**
- **rotateAutoReverse**

## Constants

- **Value calculation modes**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAKeyframeAnimation/calculationMode] property.
